name: RoboVollyBall
description:
A post apocalyptic world, and your one goal, your one desire, is to win the robo volly tournament. Build your character and robot and take on a series of increasingly difficult opponents to take home the trophy and save your country from extinction!

This is my submition for the Wowieeeeee game jam! This is the first game jam I've done and have learned a lot and this project has a couple of firsts for me and I will probably revisit it when I get done with my current project.
